1AF7F9E162724B49.title: I'm not finding any Sapphire, thank you.

display.title: Sapphire
description: With &&7LV&&r power, the primary way of getting &&aAluminium Dust&&r is by electrolyzing &&9Sapphire&&r or &&2Green Sapphire&&r. Aluminium is the main &&bMV&&r material, similar to how Steel is crucial in &&7LV&&r, and Bronze is important in the &&6Steam Age&&r.

It's possible to obtain Aluminium by processing ores such as &&6Fullers' Earth&&r, but the commitment required to see similar yields is more than sourcing your Aluminium from &&3Sapphire&&r. For this reason, you can &&5skip the quest&&r with the checkbox.
It would be wise to obtain enough Sapphire to electrolyze into a full stack of &&aAluminium Dust&&r - it &&lwill&&r be useful very soon. Plus, bonus Oxygen is always nice.
